synopsis.text: This thought-provoking anime explores the journey of an abstract bear brought to life through simple shapes and lines. As the bear ventures into the forest in search of meaning, he crosses paths with various animals. Their encounters reveal insightful stories about the relationships we form and the connections between imagination and reality. Crafted by talented students at Tokyo University of the Arts, this piece uses minimalist animation to capture the essence of its themes. With imagination, even circles, points, and lines can become something greater and touch the hearts of viewers. As we follow the meandering path of this pensive bear composed of basic elements, we discover that sometimes the simplest things can lead us to reflect profoundly on life.
